E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- Northeastern has offered me a better contract!
They offer a BIG amount of money!

Regards,
Fred Myers



Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Shawn Webster



Date: Saturday, 2/1/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
RF Herman Bauer, MR Max Ferran
in return for
2B Walter Ng.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Monday, 2/3/1983
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Northeastern has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Fred Myers

Regards,
Shawn Webster

Hugh Ly is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,

Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1983
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more playing time.
I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
Walter Ng



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1983
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Shawn Webster

Jose Coronas
